'''Standard Shipping Pallet''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for Standard Shipping Pallet is obtainable from a [[Remarkable Chest]] after following the current inside an underwater cave accessible after the completion of [[Hidden Exploration Objective]] "[[Rusty Rudder Q&A]]".

==How to Obtain==
Obtained from a Remarkable Chest in [[Erinnyes Forest]].
